Velocity_I = [5]

Velocity_I.observe(update_velocity)

# Screen Settings
scene.width = 700
scene.height = 400

# Object Motion & Parameter Settings
g = 9.81
b = 0.1
h = 10
v0 = 15
mass1 = [5]

def reset_scene():
    for obj in scene.objects:
        obj.visible = False
    ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,h,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red, make_trail=True)
    floor = box(pos=vector(0,0,0), size=vector(30,0.1,10), color=color.green)
    return ball

ball = reset_scene()

while True:
    rate(100)
    t = 0
    dt = 0.01
    ball.pos.x += v0*dt
    ball.pos.y = h - 0.5*g*t**2
    while ball.pos.y - ball.radius <= floor.pos.y:
        rate(100)
        t += dt
        ball.pos.x += v0*dt
        ball.pos.y = h - 0.5*g*t**2
